ygData.subject: failure notice (fwd)
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve found a great Forum site, that soon will be hitched up to EQ Stratics.  It not only has class specific boards, but also has 4 general game boards, and a
ygData.messageBody:
I've found a great Forum site, that soon will be hitched
up to EQ Stratics. It not only has class specific
boards, but also has 4 general game boards, and a board for
each server. It's VERY fast loading, and has a devoted
following of intelligent and sincere posters. Stop by and
check it out, see ffor yourself!

The class-specific boards are brand new, and just waiting
to be filled with threads. For an idea what the boards have
been like to date, check out the main Tavern board.

http://www.rpgforum.com/eq/index.html

Ximena
